info.name: Sokol Learning Platform - Complete API
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for Sokol Learning Platform - AI-Powered Adaptive Learning Backend

## üöÄ Features Covered
- **Phase 1**: Core Infrastructure & User Management
- **Phase 2**: Learning Paths & Content Management  
- **Phase 3**: AI Integration & Dynamic Prompts
- **Phase 4**: Assessments & Certificates
- **Phase 5**: Advanced Analytics & Adaptive Intelligence

## üîß Setup Instructions
1. Import this collection
2. Import the environment file
3. Update environment variables (base_url, openai_key)
4. Run the "Auth - Login" request to get access token
5. Token will be automatically set for subsequent requests

## üìö Documentation
Full API documentation available at: http://localhost:3000/api/docs
